overview: Kindness & Exuberance is the first solo show performed by Josie Long. It was originally performed during the Edinburgh Fringe 2006, where Long won the best newcomer award for it.  It a show about small things Long likes & her love of DIY culture and DIY standup clubs.  You can find it as an extra on the "Trying Is Good" DVD.
title: Kindness & Exuberance
